Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Cleopatra \Cleopatra\ n. a queen of Egypt; b. 69 b. c., d. 30 b. c. [WordNet 1.5]
Cleopatra n : beautiful and charismatic queen of Egypt; mistress of Julius Caesar and later of Mark Antony; killed herself to avoid capture by Octavian (69-30 BC)
